pageHeader.subtitle: Design and development for an online catalog with a custom CMS backend.
pageHeader.description: >- Luminox makes military-grade watches marketed towards the military and outdoor enthusiasts. I worked closely with the company founders to create an online catalog of their products. The site included a custom content management system that I hand-coded using PHP. The admin section of the site allowed the marketing team to add new products and update information.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
